Gnar's CC on his ult is amazing. Somebody tries to towerdive and is now escaping? Ult them into you. Don't want to deal with their crap and just want to leave? Ult them away. His Mini form E is awesome too. I got a double kill on an opposing towerdive because of random hopping around and letting the tower do the work.

the one thing i dont understand as to why he has that w passive. how is it fair for a melee to play vs that? u legit give him everything and then nerf anyone who can catch up to him ( riven,darius) and dont help them ease the lane whatsoever.
